name: 3D Moon Base Parking PRO - Full Lunar Car Driving Version
name_original: 3D Moon Base Parking PRO - Full Lunar Car Driving Version
description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

Get ready for a parking & exploration game that is out of this world!

This parking game is not like others you've played before. You have two missions that are required to be completed before progressing to the next level.

1) You must find and collect valuable moon rocks located throughout the moon base. In order to find the moon rocks, you need to look at your map and then track down the rocks and load them into your lunar buggy.

2) Once you collect all the moon rocks on the level, you then need to locate the parking zone. Once this special zone is located, you need to carefully park your lunar buggy on the parking zone.

All of this might sound easy, but you are up against adverse conditions, various obstacles, and zero gravity! Good luck!

FEATURES

- 10 levels to complete.
- 3D graphics.
- All lunar vehicles are unlocked!
- Multiple sterring options.
- Multiple camera views!
